$WHERE_OPTION$

SELECT A.SRV_ID, A.PARM_ID, A.PARM_DESC, A.PARM_TP, A.DEF_VAL, A.SORTS, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT, B.NAME AS PARM_TP_NM FROM PARM_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON ( B.PCODE = 'A03' AND A.PARM_TP = B.CODE )
$WHERE_OPTION$
ORDER BY A.SORTS LIMIT #START_NO#, #PAGE_CNT#

SELECT A.SRV_ID, A.PARM_ID, A.PARM_DESC, A.PARM_TP, A.DEF_VAL, A.SORTS, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT, B.NAME AS PARM_TP_NM FROM PARM_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON ( B.PCODE = 'A03' AND A.PARM_TP = B.CODE )
$WHERE_OPTION$
ORDER BY A.SORTS

SELECT A.SRV_ID, A.PARM_ID, A.PARM_DESC, A.PARM_TP, A.DEF_VAL, A.SORTS, A.REG_DT, A.MOD_DT, B.NAME AS PARM_TP_NM FROM PARM_MST A LEFT OUTER JOIN COM_CODE B ON ( B.PCODE = 'A03' AND A.PARM_TP = B.CODE ) WHERE SRV_ID = #SRV_ID# AND PARM_ID = #PARM_ID#
sqlMap.statement: INSERT INTO PARM_MST(SRV_ID, PARM_ID, PARM_DESC, PARM_TP, DEF_VAL, SORTS, REG_DT ) VALUES (#SRV_ID#, #PARM_ID#, #PARM_DESC#, #PARM_TP#, #DEF_VAL#, #SORTS#, NOW() )
UPDATE PARM_MST SET PARM_DESC=#PARM_DESC#, PARM_TP=#PARM_TP#, DEF_VAL=#DEF_VAL#, SORTS=#SORTS#, MOD_DT=NOW() WHERE SRV_ID = #SRV_ID# AND PARM_ID = #PARM_ID#
DELETE FROM PARM_MST WHERE SRV_ID = #SRV_ID# AND PARM_ID = #PARM_ID#
